First, create a helper function to calculate the length of a linked list.
Get the lengths of both lists using the helper function.
Calculate the difference in lengths and determine which list is longer.
Move the longer list's pointer ahead by the difference in lengths.
Move both pointers together until they meet (same node) or both reach null.
If we reach the end without finding intersection, return null.
